Articles.Content:
The Unity fatal error window is showing up intermittently during scene changes. Most of the crashes have been from VAB to KSC, but it can also happen launching from VAB to pad, and also when leaving SPH.

My prior heavily modded KSP 1.12.3 playthrough had no Unity crashes. It started as soon as I started a new playthrough using some different mods:

  • KSRSS instead of JNSQ
  • BDB instead of Near Future and RestockPlus)
  • Skyhawk Science System instead of CTT).
  • I'm also using a slightly newer version of Kopernicus than I was running before.
  • I was using Scatterer and EVE, but already uninstalled them while debugging and the crashes still happen.
  • My player.log shows a few NullRefs for KER but that's sort of normal.

The problem seems to occur "randomly", perhaps due to accumulated errors after a long time playing.

player.log, error.log, crash.dmp: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eHrFz5iCdbCa1Wl8w4-qglrDA8nrrnd0/view?usp=sharing

Any help is appreciated.

Edited May 22, 2022 by DeadJohn
(already eliminated Scatterer and EVE as causes)
